body:
**What happened**:
The rbd plugin use "rbd info" error:
```
/ # rbd info volume-9b7dc9e1-dc65-42ef-9506-c54d137ba305 -m 10.66.166.39:6789,10
.66.166.56:6789,10.66.167.144:6789,10.66.168.23:6789,10.66.169.142:6789 --pool v
olumes --id lvs01cinder --key=xxxxx== --format=
json
2019-03-22 07:27:34.258083 7fb67ff26d40 -1 did not load config file, using default settings.
2019-03-22 07:27:34.263422 7fb67ff26d40 -1 Errors while parsing config file!
2019-03-22 07:27:34.263427 7fb67ff26d40 -1 parse_file: cannot open /etc/ceph/ceph.conf: (2) No such file or directory
2019-03-22 07:27:34.263432 7fb67ff26d40 -1 parse_file: cannot open ~/.ceph/ceph.conf: (2) No such file or directory
2019-03-22 07:27:34.263433 7fb67ff26d40 -1 parse_file: cannot open ceph.conf: (2) No such file or directory
2019-03-22 07:27:34.264838 7fb67ff26d40 -1 Errors while parsing config file!
2019-03-22 07:27:34.264846 7fb67ff26d40 -1 parse_file: cannot open /etc/ceph/ceph.conf: (2) No such file or directory
2019-03-22 07:27:34.264847 7fb67ff26d40 -1 parse_file: cannot open ~/.ceph/ceph.conf: (2) No such file or directory
2019-03-22 07:27:34.264847 7fb67ff26d40 -1 parse_file: cannot open ceph.conf: (2) No such file or directory
2019-03-22 07:27:34.290166 7fb67ff26d40 -1 auth: unable to find a keyring on /etc/ceph/ceph.client.lvs01cinder.keyring,/etc/ceph/ceph.keyring,/etc/ceph/keyring,/etc/ceph/keyring.bin,: (2) No such file or directory
{"name":"volume-9b7dc9e1-dc65-42ef-9506-c54d137ba305","size":1073741824,"objects":256,"order":22,"object_size":4194304,"block_name_prefix":"rbd_data.fef50c2eefb203","format":2,"features":["layering"],"flags":[]}, invalid character '-' after top-level value
```
The messages before and after json result is warning string and no effect to rbd info, but it is effect to parse the output. So the kubernetes will failed:
```
Warning   VolumeResizeFailed   PersistentVolumeClaim   Error expanding volume "shentao/cindersimple" of plugin kubernetes.io/rbd : rbd info failed, error: can not get image size info volume-9b7dc9e1-dc65-42ef-9506-c54d137ba305: 2019-03-22 06:24:58.972703 7f0391868d40 -1 did not load config file, using default settings.
```
**What you expected to happen**:
Kubernete no failed and errors


**How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)**:
Remove the config file

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a bug.
labels.name: kind/bug

title: rbd info output parse error
